byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

abstract: United Technologies does not believe merger with Honeywell International will clear regulators, but Honeywell argues that union would have many benefits.

headline.print_headline: Honeywell and United Technologies Disagree on Merits of Merger
headline.main: Honeywell and United Technologies Disagree on Merits of Merger

snippet: Analysts appear to have concluded that putting the two companies together poses at least some antitrust risk.
lead_paragraph: Analysts appear to have concluded that putting the two companies together poses at least some antitrust risk.
